titles.title: A bill to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 15 days.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 571.

bill.summary:
2/8/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Protect America Act of 2007 to extend its authority for 15 days.
